docs.lead_paragraph: His name was Steve, he wore a beard, and he lived with a blonde who had a voice like Lauren Bacall's. He was pleasant and candid (nice old ladies would say that he was such a sweet young man) and he regularly turned on with marijuana or blew his mind with LSD.

headline.main: Drugs a Growing Campus Problem; The Use of Drugs on College Campuses Is a Growing Problem

docs.abstract: survey on rising use of LSD, marijuana and other hallucinatory drugs by coll students

docs.lead_paragraph: Few drugs have experienced so rapid a rise in use and so sudden a fall as DMSO, the industrial solvent that is said to be useful in treating almost any human ailment.
docs.abstract: DMSO controversy and NYC conf discussed
docs.snippet: Few drugs have experienced so rapid a rise in use and so sudden a fall as DMSO, the industrial solvent that is said to be useful in treating almost any human ailment.

docs.lead_paragraph: The somewhat baffling two faces of DMSO were described here yesterday at an international meeting. This compound has been acclaimed as good for a great many human ailments and yet has been withdrawn from use in humans because of evidence that it has bad effects on animals' eyes.

headline.main: New Data Shed Light on the Baffling Drug DMSO
